text: @journchat (Q11) Most helpful experience? Worked as circulation marketing manager, where focus was serving the reader. #journchat
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journchat (Q.11) Started as reporter in Philly. Reporting is best job.  Most helpful experience for social media role? #journchat. More
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journchat: (Q10) Advice on jobs in new media/journalism? Learn to tell a story in print, audio, video. Key? Be a storyteller.#journchat
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journochat: (Q10) Gosh, I don't really have advice on those looking 4 jobs in pr/social media. Help from folks listening in? #journchat
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journchat: (Q9) While we have more journos deeply engaged on SM, it is tough to balance multiple demands and deadlines. #journchat
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journchat (Q9) @jennydeluxe, @stephcliff, @mickimaynard, @timobrien, @jenny8lee, @tomjolly...#journchat. MORE

text: @journchat : (Q9) Honestly, have encountered ZERO resistance. The troops are leading the way.  @brianstelter, @palafo, MORE #journchat

text: Advice from RT @etanowitz: Q8 (Orlando Sentinel),...read up on the reporter..connect on SM sites, don't be too pushy at 1st#journchat

text: @journchat (Q8) Same as Q1.Bring value. READ reporter's work. Pitch idea (not release) via email. Include links/background. #journchat
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journchat (Q7 cont.) How does that affect coverage? In my view, mostly in stories reporters choose to cover, #journchat
author: JenniferPreston

text: @journchat : (Q7) Despite earnest  and sincere efforts to be objective, everyone brings their own experience to the table. #journchat. MORE
